article: You're surrounded by robots and you probably don't even know it. Most are not all that _ and they won't come up to you and speak like a friend. Even if you're unaware of them, they know you're there. Robots are monitoring _ in hospitals, providing banking services, _ people from burning buildings and assisting astronauts in _ . Robots are everywhere.  Are robots _ or deadly enemies? Robotic expert Hans Moravec says intelligent robots today are no smarter than the average insect. But, don't feel too _ about that. For example, army ants in South America _ everything in their path when they go to war--forests, crops, buildings, people...  In case you _ don't care about our little mechanical friends, _ this: Robot technology is currently _ at a rate 10 million times faster than the evolution of _ .  Considering the advances in robot technology during the upcoming years, Moravec says that robots must pass through four _ of development before they rule the planet.  First robot technology must achieve the ability to _ as generalpurpose tools with software running at one million instructions per second (MIPS). Those robots will have the _ of reptiles . Next, this happening into 2020, robots will have acquired brains capable of _ 300 million MIPS, which will give them the intelligence of smart mice. A hundred billion MIPS will be _ sometime after 2030. By then robots will be provided by their _ (humankind) with monkeylike brains. _ , at the dawn of 2040, robots will _ human intelligence and they will quickly surpass humans and challenge people for supremacy of the planet.
